title: My Ex-husband - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Beautiful Female Lead   Celebrities   Divorce   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage   Modern Day   Second Chance   Wealthy Characters
author: Annex   별규
description:
I got married at first sight and broke up in a year. And four years have passed.

Yun-jae, who was crying and clinging to Eun-seol, has returned.

 “Let’s start again.”

Are you crazy? Anyone at will? Will you say ‘male’ if you put only one dot on ‘nim’?

Now he’s just a pathetic ex-husband… … But why does my heart keeps pounding without notice?

Can Eun-seol’s struggle to avoid being tempted by her ex-husband succeed?>
